content: Hey there, we are trying to map data into Carin BB EOB format. We have a field for "billing provider". Where is the appropriate place to put this?
Is it just EOB.provider? Or is it performing/rendering provider (as part of care team)?

It is the EoB.provider, that is correct. That element has a comment connected to it that says "The identifier assigned to the Billing Provider."
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/StructureDefinition-C4BB-ExplanationOfBenefit-definitions.html#ExplanationOfBenefit.provider
